body:
Comment 1: 
To be safe, it should test Sqrt(4) against 2. (It could use more elaborate comparison
here, but I'm afraid it will unnecessarily complicate the presentation here without
much benefit. For we're trying to teach people how to write tests, but not how to
test numerical algorithms)

IMO, we should extract all code from doc/code.html into doc/progs, and make sure
the tests are successful.

What do you think?
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
